name: Gin Rummy - Classic Card Games
description:
Gin Rummy the classic table card game has been rebuilt from the ground up - get it today!

Knock knock. Who’s there? It’s Gin Rummy. Gin Rummy who? Gin Rummy, the awesome, fully rebuilt version of the classic card game, let me in!

That’s right everyone, Gin Rummy has been fully rebuilt from the ground up allowing you to enjoy your favorite family card table game on your device whenever you want.

Install today and find out now if you have what it takes to be the king of Gin Rummy!

Make sure to check out our other games including Finger Physics, Bumper Stars, America’s Next Top Model, and Go Fish Multiplayer. You can also follow PressOK on Twitter at www.twitter.com/press_ok.
